Chinese.Description: 添加新的温度机制并替代原版的低温机制，每个生物有独立的温度条，当高温达到一定的阈值时会触发燃烧。当低温达到一定阈值时会触发短暂冰冻。部分伤害具有高温属性。

English.Description: Overhauls the temperature mechanic entirely, at a high temperature creatures will burn and at a low temperature they will freeze temporarily. Certain types of damage or buffs can increase or decrease temperature.
